reviewtext: The Cisco-Linksys EZXS88W EtherFast 10/100 8-Port Workgroup Switch does exactly what it is advertised to do - 8 ports, plug it in, and it works great.  It doesn't get any better than this.  I could whine - it doesn't stack (without a mount) on my WRT54GL.  I solved this by not stacking it.
